subsection.name: Overview
subsection.p: This plugin uses Subversion logs to create a changelog for each tagged version of a project.

subsection.name: Pre-requisite
subsection.p:
There are some requisite for using this plugin :
As this plugin uses Subversion commands, it is necessary to have the svn command line executable in your path
This plugins needs Java 1.4 or more to run correctly.
